ValidationRule.description: The CQ Close Date must be lower than or equal to today
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(CQ_Close_Date__c > TODAY(),ISCHANGED( CQ_Close_Date__c ), CONTAINS(Quote_Type__c, 'CQ'), NOT($Permission.CQ_Business_admin),$Profile.Name <> 'Data Loader Profile',$Profile.Name <> 'Integration API Only Profile')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The "CQ Close Date" cannot be in the future
